name: business-waste-by-region
description: The categorised quantities of the waste generated by industry & commerce.
creator: SEPA
notes: Published as a series of downloadable Excel files.

name: meta
description: Meta level information.
creator: DCS

name: ace-furniture-avg-weight
description: The per-furniture-category average weights of items sold.
creator: Alloa Community Enterprises
notes: Supplied as an Excel spreadsheet.

name: household-waste-analysis
description: (An anonymised subset of) An analysis of sampled bin collection contents.
creator: ZWS
notes: Supplied as an Excel spreadsheet.

name: business-waste-by-sector
description: The categorised quantities of the waste generated by industry & commerce.
creator: SEPA
notes: Published as a series of downloadable Excel files.

name: co2e-multiplier
description: Per-material weight-multipliers to calaculate CO2e amounts. This data has been copied from section 6.2 of The Scottish Carbon Metric.
creator: ZWS
notes: Published as a PDF document.

name: stirling-community-food-footfall
description: The per-day number of people visiting the store.
creator: Transition Stirling
notes: Supplied as an Excel spreadsheet.

name: region
description: Scottish council areas with UK government codes and Wikidata IDs.
creator: DCS
notes: Choose to use the common name for each region.

name: household-co2e
description: The carbon impact of the waste generated by household.
creator: SEPA
notes: Published through a web-based data tool, the data can be downloaded as a CSV file.

name: fairshare
description: The per-year per-quarter per-material amount (weight and CO2e) of reused items.
creator: The Fair Share
notes: Supplied as an Excel spreadsheet.

name: bin-collection
description: The categorised quantities of the waste collected from household bins.
creator: Stirling council
notes: Published through a web-based data tool (CKAN), the data can be downloaded as CSV files.

name: household
description: Occupied residential dwelling counts. Useful for calculating per-household amounts.
creator: NRS
notes: Published as an RDF data cube, the data can be accessed via SPARQL.

name: household-waste
description: The categorised quantities of the ('managed') waste generated by household.
creator: SEPA
notes: Published as an RDF data cube, the data can be accessed via SPARQL.

name: population
description: People counts. Useful for calculating per-citizen amounts.
creator: NRS
notes: Published as an RDF data cube, the data can be accessed via SPARQL.

name: stirling-community-food-tonnes
description: The per-day amount of food flowing in/out of the organisation from/to partner organisations.
creator: Transition Stirling
notes: Supplied as an Excel spreadsheet.

name: waste-site-material-io
description: The per-year per-material I/O of waste sites.
creator: SEPA
notes: Published through a web-based data tool, the data can be downloaded as a CSV file.

name: ewc-code
description: EWC (European Waste Classification) codes and descriptions. Also a mapping to SEPA's materials classification.
creator: European Commission of the EU
notes: Published as a web page.

name: ace-furniture-count
description: The per-accounting-period per-furniture-category counts of items sold.
creator: Alloa Community Enterprises
notes: Supplied as an Excel spreadsheet.

name: waste-site-io
description: The locations, services, capacities and per-year I/O of waste sites.
creator: SEPA
notes: Published through a web-based data tool, the data can be downloaded as a CSV file.

name: ace-furniture-to-scottishCarbonMetric
description: A per-furniture-category mapping to a Scottish Carbon Metric material.
creator: DCS
notes: A reasoned mapping.

name: sepa-material
description: SEPA's waste materials classification.
creator: SEPA
notes: Published through a web-based data tool, the data can be downloaded as CSV files.
